ygData.subject: Re: Into the Fire - Dokken
ygData.msgSnippet: Pinsir fires at the same area Sycther fired, not meaning to mimic him, though. He fired twice... ... From:  To:

From: "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@...>

Pinsir fires at the same area Sycther fired, not meaning to mimic him,
though. He fired twice...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, April 07, 2001 7:52 PM
Subject: Re: Into the Fire - Dokken


> ::Prowl/Zardus/Incarcinator/EndBringer/Scyther/Demise::
>
> Prowl felt shots coming at Iron Raptor, jumping forward and tackling
> her out of the way. The shots hit him but do little damage. He kisses
> her.
>
> "I'll see you after the battle, love. Be careful," he says and jumps
> up, flying at Choran and firing two signature seeking missiles from
> each one of his two missile launchers at the bot.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Zardus flies up, most of the shots missing him. He turns around,
> firing two more energy draining at Unitron. The two he had previously
> fired adjust their course, heading for Unitron again.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Incarcinator fires once, destroying the missile heading for him. He
> aims at Unitron, firing two more shells.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Killfest jumps back, two missiles hitting the ground in front of him.
> He lands the explosion failing to take him off his feet, though
> shrapnel scratches his armor. He fires his optics at Vehement's
> missile, destroying it.
>
> Killfest aims, firing two missiles and an EMP shot at Vehement.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> EndBringer roars, slamming his fist into the two missiles. They
> explode, making him step back to keep his balance, his arm charred but
> funtional. He looks around for a target and sees Sun Crusher, firing
> two missiles from each launcher at him.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scyther watches Double Punch fire at EndBringer, and then his scanner
> locks on to Double Punch's signature. He smiles.
>
> "Gotcha!" he mumbles to himself, firing four charges down at Double
> Punch. Scyther was still cloaked.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> The two fireballs hit Demise, but he didn't care. He jumps up, easily
> reaching Flesh Ripper and grabbing at him.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> > (I have quite a bit of enemy fire to post for, so please correct me
> if I miss
> > any attacks)
> >
> > The Protectobots/The Oblitercons/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark
> Claw/Nemesis
> >
>
Enforcer/Scattershot/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarte
r/
> > Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/Sun
> Crusher/Reflector/Smokescreen:
> >
> >
> >
> > Demon Wulf's boosters in his feet activated, sending him blasting
> off into
> > the air, a dozen rapid shots tearing at his armored legs.
> >
> > He let out a howl of pain, raising his sword and firing a blade
> missile at
> > the Cybertronian Fire.  A blue orb of EMP energy formed in his free
> hand and
> > he threw it downward, and when it hit the ground, if everyone stayed
> in their
> > place it would go off and an EMP field would hit Alecto and Kali.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Flesh Ripper pushed himself up, looking at Scavenger for only a
> micro-second
> > and looking back to Demise, who was chargin him.  He fired three
> fire balls
> > from his mouth at the charging Predacon's torso, boosters in his
> feet lifting
> > him up off the dead ground.  He looked to Demon Wulf, knowing it was
> time to
> > use a large amount of energy.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Dark Claw felt two missiles strike his frame and he cursed.  His
> armor was
> > nearly penetrated.  His sensors detected a large amount of enemy
> robots, and
> > his brothers that were gaining altitude.  He armed his launchers,
> firing two
> > missiles at the Cybertronian Fire.  The other launcher fired two
> > energy-signature seeking missiles.  One at Luzbel and the other at
> Wrath.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Dark One surveyed his team.  Or what was left of it.  Sensors told
> him Hiss
> > was critical and Scavenger was almost there.  Of course, Dark One
> didn't need
> > scanners to tell him this.  He searched around for his plasma rifle,
> > eventually finding it.  He raised the rifle, firing off a couple pot
> shots
> > off at Demon Wulf and started walking backwards towards Hiss.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Breakdown jumpd, two stinger missiles exploding where he had been.
> He went
> > flying through the air, landing on his feet painfully.  He let out a
> yell,
> > raising his rifle and firing off two grenades upwards, only these
> were set to
> > explode after five seconds, not on impact.  The greandes themselves
> would not
> > hit Injector, but the explosions should.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Pyro raised his flame cannon, firing off a long burst of flames at
> two
> > incoming missiles, the missiles detonating prematurely.  Pyro raised
> an arm
> > in defense, the explosion not doing that much damage.  The flames
> didn't hurt
> > him, and the shrapnel only caused a few cuts.
> >
> > His weapons were useless against Vehement, so he decided to pick a
> new
> > target.  He raised his cannon, firing off two fire balls at
> Abominous, hoping
> > his weapons would hurt the behemoth.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Hiss and Scavenger slipped into stasis lock due to extensive damage,
> unaware
> > of anything.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Hot Spot dodged enemy fire, firing off a fire ball at one of the
> Headstrong
> > holograms.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Groove fired off two more photon blasts at Abominous, not sure if he
> could
> > even hurt it with the puny weapon he had.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Blades' armor was torn apart as rapid laser energy dug into him.  He
> let out
> > a yell, firing off twenty highly-explosive shells at Unitron.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > First Aid didn't get a response from the robot that had saved him,
> so he
> > turned away and activated his scanners, attempting to find any
> Maximals who
> > needed medical attention.  He saw the incoming missiles and ducked
> down.  But
> > the missiles changed course and found him, exploding and sending him
> into the
> > air a few feet, crashing down, his frame a charred mess.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Streetwise looked to the damaged First Aid and let out a yell and
> charged
> > Reflector's general direction, firing off three photon blasts at
> him.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Nemesis Enforcer raised his weapon, some kind of explosive energy
> striking
> > him in the back.  He let outa yell.  But it was more of a yell of
> surprise
> > then pain since the blast had hit his powerful wings instead any
> exposed
> > parts.  He turned around and cursed.  "Traitor!"
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Scattershot raised his rifle, firng off twenty-five armor piercing
> rounds at
> > Abominous' left shoulder.  "Take that Maximal!" he screamed,
> followed by
> > laughter.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Imprisoner felt Element weapons fire strike him, but he ignored the
> pain.
> > Instead, he armed more missiles and fired four missiles off at the
> > Cybertronian Fire.  The laser cannon swiveled and firing off three
> blasts at
> > Darkfate.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Predator jumped over an EMP blast, the shock wave of the blast
> causing him to
> > crash to his knee painfully.  "Sons of..." he mumbled, firing off
> two rockets
> > from his launcher at the Cybertronian Fire.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Choran raised an arm to block Element autogun fire and cursed, the
> annoying
> > shots digging into his armor.  He fired off twenty-five rapid laser
> blasts at
> > Iron Raptor.
> > "Take that vile witch."
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Shockwave pulled up, gaining altitude quickly and pulling hard
> left.  That
> > would take care of regular weapons fire.  But he detected two
> ES-seeking
> > missiles.  He fired down ten rapid laser blasts vertically at the
> missiles
> > straight at their path.  He armed his launchers, firing down two
> missiles at
> > Killfest.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Unitron's scanners detected the draining field and he pulled up to
> avoid it,
> > going diagonally up, two plasma blasts from Steel striking his
> underbelly as
> > well as five highly explosive shells from Blades.  The rest of the
> shots
> > passed by him harmlessly.  He cursed, something about "irritating
> traitors",
> > and pulled down again, smoke coming out of the bottom of his space
> fighter
> > form.  He armed his weapons, firing twenty-five rapid laser blasts
> at Zardus
> > and launched two missiles.  Both ES-seeking missiles.  One at Steel
> and the
> > other at Incarcinator.
> >
> > His sensors detected the shell of Incarcinator's that had barely
> missed him.
> > He thought for an astro-second and formulated a plan on how to deal
> with them.
> > ---
> >
> > The flame-red space fighter did a basic rolling maneuver, only two
> of six
> > shots striking his armored wing, causing dents and affecting his
> velocity.  A
> > missile from the Element passed by during his maneuver, causing no
> damage as
> > it eventually exploded far away from Firestarter.
> >
> > "You call yourselves Predacons and conquerers?  Yet you align
> yourself with
> > the Autobots!  Oh, you'll die!  Don't think you won't be executed
> for your
> > crimes!" he screamed in anger.  There were to many people and not
> enough
> > things going well for the Empire.  He fired off four missiles, two
> > energy-signature seeking missiles that spread out, one heading for
> Twister
> > and the other for Venomous.
> >
> > The two other missiles screamed through the air towards the
> Cybertronian Fire.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > The cloaked ex-Predacon assassin raised his pincher, watching
> Beeline destroy
> > two missiles inbound for Vehement and one heading for Manterror with
> its
> > optic weapons.
> >
> > His left pincher launched two energy-signature seeking missiles off
> at
> > EndBringer's left arm.  The other pinche raised, firing two missiles
> at the
> > Cybertronian Fire.  He began to jog away from where he was so when
> people
> > fired he would be somewhat safe.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Manterror saw the incoming missile and laughed, but then yelled when
> it
> > exploded against his exo-skeleton, the heavy armor dented from the
> explosion.
> >  "You Maximals are getting irritating..." he sighed, raising his
> pinchers and
> > firing off a total of four ion disks at Luzbel.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Injector saw rapid fire from Shivah and he flew to the side, five
> shots
> > digging into his armor.  He clenched his mouth shut in pain,
> momentarily
> > putting pressure on the wound.  He raised his right arm, firing off
> two
> > stinger missiles at Shivah from the launcher he held.  He didn't
> notice
> > Breakdown's shots and when they went off as planned the explosion
> hit
> > Injector.
> >
> > The insect went flying backwards through the air, multiple cuts
> leaking
> > mech-fluid.  His charred form began screaming and ranting, firing
> off ten
> > rapid laser blasts from his optic sensors at Breakdown after he
> stabalized
> > himself.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Smokescreen got set up and took aim, firing off a blast from his
> heavy-laser
> > rifle at Vehement's head.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Vehement was struck dead on with Darkfate's megablaster, and
> unknowingly
> > knocked him out of the way of enemy weapons fire.  He cursed and
> sputtered
> > angrily.  He raised his rigth arm, the cannon where a hand should be
> launched
> > off two missiles.  One at Darkfate, the other at Killfest.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Sun Crusher raised his arm to block incoming Element autogun fire,
> laughing.
> > He was struck from a missile and he turned around cursing as a
> searing pain
> > filled his body from the explosion.  He raised his arm, firing two
> missiles
> > off at Reptilica.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Reflector flew down, avoiding most weapons fire accept for two
> photon bolts
> > that impacted with his chest plate.  He looked down momentarily to
> see a
> > molten dent in his chest and he looked up with rage in his face.
> >
> > He raised both arms, firing off a total of four energy-signature
> seeking
> > missiles at Streetwise.
> >
> > ---
> >
> > Serpentor laughed at his shot against Nemesis Enforcer.  So well
> planned.
> > Join the Alliance, kill that bastard Nemesis Enforcer and end the
> vendetta.
> > But an unexpected thing happned. The plasma blast he had fired
> didn't hit
> > Nemesis Enforcer's head, but struck his wings, which Serpentor knew
> from
> > experience were near indestructable.
> >
> > He yelped as rapid laser fire from his long time foe headed down
> towards him,
> > knocking him to his back with a few dents in his abdomen.
>
>
>
>

>
>
